alert.note: Alert for Koolau Leeward; Maui Central Valley North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 20 at 7:24PM HST until November 21 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF OAHU INCLUDING MOST AREAS IN MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Trade winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Oahu, Molokai and Maui. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Koolau Leeward; Maui Central Valley North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains
